Name: Surf & Turf
Ingredients: 1.25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Dry sherry adds a slight salty 'surf' note to this riff on the classic Turf Club Cocktail .
History: Created 8th September 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. I've tweaked the recipe in recent years, the original: 1½ Old Tom gin ¾ Dry vermouth ½ Fino sherry ¼ Orange curacao 1 dash Aromatic bitters ½ chilled water
Nutrition: One serving of Surf & Turf contains 171 calories
